root.message: The COMPILING_ORG field for indicator 7-2-1, translated into en
root.data:
Data compilers

Name:

The International Energy Agency (IEA) and the United Nations Statistics Division (UNSD)

Description:

The IEA and UNSD are the primary compilers of national energy statistics and develop internationally comparable energy balances based on internationally agreed methodologies. Aggregates are based on analysis merging of IEA and UNSD data.
